alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Kent; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kent, Ionia and southeastern Montcalm Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wyoming, or 8 miles south of Grand Rapids, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Caledonia around 355 PM EDT. East Grand Rapids and Gerald R. Ford International Airport around 400 PM EDT. Kentwood around 405 PM EDT. Lowell around 425 PM EDT. Saranac around 440 PM EDT. Ionia and Belding around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lyons, Cutlerville, Clarksville, Pewamo, Ionia County Airport, Grattan, Muir, Alto, Alaska and Greenville Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
